scripts.build: npm run -w apps/frontend build && npm run -w apps/backend build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c green,cyan "npm run -w apps/frontend dev" "npm run -w apps/backend dev"
scripts.test: npm run -w apps/frontend test && npm run -w apps/backend test
scripts.type-check: npm run -w apps/frontend type-check && npm run -w apps/backend type-check
